Html source of FlashTest.htm:
&lt;html&gt;
    &lt;body&gt;
        &lt;br /&gt;----- &lt;br /&gt;
        &lt;script&gt;
            var movieName = &#039;&#039;;
            var flash = &#039;&#039;;
           
            function getMovieName()
            {
                movieName = &#039;a.swf?&lt;overflowed&gt;&#039;;
            }
           
            function printFlash()
            {
                               
                flash += &#039;&lt;OBJECT &#039;;
                flash += &#039;ID=&quot;something&quot;&#039;;
                flash += &#039;classid=&quot;clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000&quot; &#039;;
                flash += &#039;codebase=&quot;http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=5,0,0,0&quot;&#039;;
                flash += &#039;WIDTH=&quot;70&quot;&#039;;
                flash += &#039;HEIGHT=&quot;90&quot;&#039;;
                flash += &#039;&gt;&#039;;
                flash += &#039;&lt;PARAM &#039;;
                flash += &#039;  NAME=&quot;movie&quot;&#039;;
                flash += &#039;  VALUE=&quot;&#039; + movieName + &#039;&quot;&#039;;
                flash += &#039;&lt;/OBJECT&gt;&#039;;
            }
            getMovieName();
            printFlash();
            document.write(flash);
        &lt;/script&gt;
        &lt;br /&gt;----- &lt;br /&gt;
    &lt;/body&gt;
&lt;/html&gt;
